name: Reve Bardo - Brenna Syrad
description:
This is a game made by Brenna Syrad. This game is for Game Engines. You need to work you way through 3 puzzles in order to go to the last room. The last room is the hospital rooms again. There are hints on the wall in the rooms just before the puzzle.

Reve Bardo is a game that distorts the truth. You unexpectedly ‘wake up’ in the hospital after a fatal accident. You search for a way out of the hospital but come across various puzzles that stand in your way. Solve the puzzles and earn your freedom, or don’t and be ‘asleep’ forever!

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Space - Jump
